mapper.select: SELECT mebrNo, id, name, nickname, birth, pwd, phone, gender, acct, status, grade, regDate, firstIdNo, modifyDate, lastIdNo, etc FROM MEMBER WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (id, name, nickname, birth, pwd, gender, phone, acct, regDate, firstIdNo, etc) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{birth}, #{pwd}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{acct}, now(), #{firstIdNo}, #{etc})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET nickname = #{nickname}, birth = #{birth}, pwd = #{pwd}, phone = #{phone}, modifyDate = now() WHERE id = #{id}
